name: twitch2go
title: Twitch2Go
description: An add-on to notify you when your favorite Twitch streamers are broadcasting and browse online streams.
author: vincentzhang1996@gmail.com

preferences.name: iconType
preferences.title: Icon Style
preferences.description: Choose the dark-on-light or light-on-dark icon for Twitch2Go to best fit your Firefox theme.
